sub_title: Enterprise Architect at Keysight Technologies | Helping business thrive through data and technology
summary:
Vision
• Enabling companies to thrive in utilizing data by using the best-fit methodologies and technologies
• Focusing on stakeholder collaboration and team empowerment during the total data management life cycle
• Achieving the most efficient results by leveraging assets and applying best practices


Portfolio:
• 8+ years of experience in Data and Technology especially in finance processes 
• Stakeholders management (Attaining stakeholders' trust to ensure successful data projects and mutual benefits)
• Data Management (Data Products, Data Modeling, Data Quality, and Integration)
• Digital Financial Reporting (Data-driven audit analytics and supporting data-intense financial standards implementation) 
• Enterprise systems (EPM, ERP, CCR, etc.) and business processes discovery

Looking for: Challenge, knowledge, learning, and contribution in the domain of Data 
If you want to discuss ideas or questions, please drop me a message to garb a cup of coffee

profile_positions.title: Chief Enterprise Architect - End-User Technologies and Services

profile_positions.description:
Client: Advanced Semiconductor Materials Lithography Firm
- Realizing and implementing the proper data modeling techniques to achieve the ambition in clients' enterprise-wide digital Transformation. Including data management awareness program, vendor selection, stakeholder collaboration, and realizing AS-IS and To-Be datamodels

Client: Leading Dutch Bank
- Working with the bank's financial department to unlock the potential of (Financial) data management in the area of performance, reporting, budgeting, planning, and Forecasting. Including defining needed KPIs and drivers and defining the art of possible in BI world (PowerBI)

Client: Deloitte B.V.
- Part of Deloitte Operate Proposition aiming to design and deliver a full consultancy service to our client form imagine, to deliver and run
- Worked as Chief of Staff for Enterprise, Technology, and Performance Portfolio and act as a partner in discussions on various strategic topics with senior stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Manager Data Management and Technology

profile_positions.description:
- Focusing on data management and analytics for financal processes
- Defining data model, data quality criteria, and crucial business rules for ERP master data migration and implementing of new IFRS16 lease solutions
- Team lead for SIFT Data Management and Validation solution realized using data modeling best practices, data integration (Python, SSIS), and data visualization (Web UX, PowerBI, Tableau) platforms

Client Portfolio: DSV, Sandvik, ISS, Falck, Sailing Group, Geldmaat and Newomij
profile_positions.title: Senior Advisor Data Analytics & Technology (EY Advisory)

profile_positions.description:
- Designing and implement Data-Driven Audit product aims to help auditors find anomalies in P2P and O2C processes in a unified way regardless of the ERP systems
- Enhanced management business and financial insights by consciously monitoring and reporting process inefficiencies (time, cost, quality) and anomalies (SoD, 3 way-matching) from different systems 
- Partnering with the clients to define and improve their KPIs, processes, and system changes

Client portfolio:  Scotch & Soda, Damen, Smit Lamnalco, CoA, WestLand Kaas and Enkavort

profile_positions.title: ERP Consultant [via HSO International]

profile_positions.description:
Dynamics Software is part of HSO Group

Project: Grafton Group (UK) Advance Pricing Management
Grafton Group plc is a builders merchant and DIY retailing business with 600 branches mainly in UK and Ireland.  Worked on the following functionalities and customizations: 
-	Integrated Wholesale and Retail promotion pricing engine
-	Customer segment – product category strategic pricing
-	Enhanced vendor and supplier rebates and cashback management
-	Enhanced cost, margin and sales pricing engine, product and direct-order-based
-	Enhanced sales agreement features
-	Integrated POS-Solution with wholesale capabilities
-	Operator based insight in margin structure
-	Advanced Product features and Integrated specials management,
-	Advanced Tallying
o	Responsible for testing the functionalities and organizing development for defined and customized modules in Microsoft Dynamics Ax in cooperation with the partner/customer (under the supervision of a Sr. consultant).
o	Writing change requests for new functionalities requested by Grafton
o	Conducted knowledge transfer and training sessions to our partner in the UK 

Project: Dynamic Ax 7 – Wholesale, Retail and Distribution Extension Product
o	Perform a detailed testing for the new product and work closely with developers to fix bugs.
o	Responsible for Pricing, Credit limit, and Catalogue Management extensions

Project: HSO Academy – Masterclass New Dynamics Ax 7
o	Prepared and conducted "Look and Feel" training for Dynamics Ax 7 for the new hires in HSO and an overview training about new Microsoft Technologies and trends.

volunteer_experiences.description:
Holland Alumni network aims to set up and facilitate an international network of Holland alumni, alumni-to-be, and relevant organizations.

Holland Alumni Network - The Netherlands is part of the global Holland Alumni Network and it is an association of international students and alumni who are residing in the Netherlands

Holland alumni, and anyone else who is interested, will now find all information they need on alumni matters in the Netherlands and in the rest of the world at https://www.hollandalumni.nl/

Since March 2017, Ayham elected to be the president of the Middle East chapter in Erasmus Mundus Association

Facilitated workshops about Erasmus+ Scholarships in Syria in 2014 and 2016. I shared my experience in applying for the scholarship and the required exams and procedures, followed by a discussion and questions session.
The events were held at Damascus University and at the International University in Damascus.
The recording of the workshops is available on YouTube to be accessible to all Arabic speaking candidates.
 
Event report can be found here: 
2014
http://www.em-a.eu/en/home/newsdetail-ema-members-report/erasmus-promotional-workshops-in-syria-july-14-23-2014-damascus-university-and-july-23-2014-the.html
2016
http://www.em-a.eu/en/home/newsdetail-ema-members-report/erasmus-promotional-workshops-in-damascus-syria-16th-and-24th-of-july-2016-1903.html

The YouTube recording:
http://goo.gl/QUpVDy

Previously:
The "Social Media Communication Team Coordinator" is a new position in the ME chapter board, after realizing the importance of the Social Media nowadays.
Our target is to provide a country-specific experience within the Middle East region by enabling share of experience from programs' alumni to make applying and starting of Erasmus+ course smoother and easier for a new candidate.

Holland Career Ambassadors support international students and alumni in starting a career in the Netherlands or with a Dutch company abroad. 
Organizing events and sharing my experience to inspire international students to build up a career in Holland

- Conducted a presentation at Tilburg Economic Business week "Your opportunity in the Netherlands" where I shared my experience and tips about starting an internship and career in Holland.
- Participated in the 1st Holland Career Cafe where we had a casual meeting with students to answer their questions and share some advice about finding applying for a job.
- Check out my career story here https://www.hollandalumni.nl/career/career-stories/ayham-alkawi
- Check out my video about the Dutch Business culture https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4-zvJF30w5Y&t=3s

Participated in organizing the Public Speaking Competition in 2010
Involved in many other events as a team member

volunteer_experiences.role: Co-Founder and Chairman for ICT Club
volunteer_experiences.description:
Successfully established and managed the Information Communications Technology (ICT) Club at  the International University in 2009, The club has been started with four projects: 
- IUST Life e-magazine project.
- Who? Project: which are lectures that students deliver in front of their classmates in different topics.
- Catch it PC project: an electronic information center for the engineering faculty students.
- Arranged workshops.
- Helped in arrangement and management of the scientific trips and external lectures.

It has since published four issues of IUST Life e-magazine, arranged three external lectures, two “How ?” lectures, four scientific trips and one workshop for the university students.

volunteer_experiences.role: Mentor in The Online Academic Mentorship Program
volunteer_experiences.description: Helped three Syrian students with their university and scholarship application process, by guiding them through the application process and answer their questions through Skype and emails.
